statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-15 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x - 6 , -3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 2 , -16 \, x^{3} + 35 \, x^{2} + 38 \, x - 1 , -16 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
